Description: TL12 Leather backpack, 'Amber Brown' Attractive and comfortable, this backpack by Ricardo Hinojosa showcases the beauty of amber leather. It features an outer pouch that buckles closed and adjustable shoulder straps. Fully lined, it provides a zipper pocket for small items inside. Artist: Ricardo Hinojosa MORE FROM THIS ARTIST Item Details Size Backpack: 14.8 inches H x 11.5 inches W x 6.3 inches D Straps: 25.5 inches min L - x 28.5 inches max L x 1.0 inches W Handle: 6.8 inches L x 1.0 inches W Handle drop length: 1.0 inches from strap to bag Weight 2.56 pounds Materials Leather, zamac buckles. Cotton and polyester lining Additional Info Features a zipper closure Adjustable strap(s) Genuine leather may naturally show subtle marks, scratches or wrinkles Photos are representative of the item being offered, but are not necessarily of the exact item you would receive. As is the nature of handcrafted items, there may be very slight variations from one piece to the next.
